mapper.sql: id, name, province, city, county, rural, address, contactPerson, contactMobile, status, date_format(createTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') createTime, motifyTime, isDel
mapper.insert: insert into ele_school (id, name, province, city, county, rural, address, contactPerson, contactMobile, status, createTime, motifyTime, isDel) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{city,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{county,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rural,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{motifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update ele_school
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province = #{province,jdbcType=INTEGER},
city = #{city,jdbcType=INTEGER},
county = #{county,jdbcType=INTEGER},
rural = #{rural,jdbcType=INTEGER},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contactPerson = #{contactPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contactMobile = #{contactMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
motifyTime = #{motifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
isDel = #{isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update ele_school set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{province,jdbcType=INTEGER}, city = #{city,jdbcType=INTEGER}, county = #{county,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rural = #{rural,jdbcType=INTEGER}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contactPerson = #{contactPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contactMobile = #{contactMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, motifyTime = #{motifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, isDel = #{isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT sc.id, sc.`name`, pro.`name` province, ci.`name` city, co.`name` county, ru.`name` rural, sc.address, sc.contactPerson, sc.contactMobile, sc.STATUS, date_format( sc.createTime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) createTime, sc.motifyTime, sc.isDel FROM ele_school sc LEFT JOIN ele_rbac_organization pro ON sc.province = pro.id LEFT JOIN ele_rbac_organization ci ON sc.city = ci.id LEFT JOIN ele_rbac_organization co ON sc.county = co.id LEFT JOIN ele_rbac_organization ru ON sc.rural = ru.id WHERE sc.IsDel = 1
AND sc.`name` like CONCAT('%', #{keywords},'%')
